laboratory_examinations.findings: Hematocrit was 54.7% (reference range for men, 41.0 to 53.0) and erythrocyte count was 6,570,000 per cubic millimeter (reference range, 4,500,000 to 5,900,000).

laboratory_examinations.date: 3 Mo before This Evaluation, Other Hospital
laboratory_examinations.findings: FVC: 1.60 liters (32% of predicted value), FEV1: 1.54 liters (37% of predicted value), Ratio of FEV1:FVC: 96%, Total lung capacity: 3.07 liters (46% of predicted value).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At hospital evaluation, FVC: 1.60 liters (34% of predicted value), FEV1: 1.38 liters (35% of predicted value), Ratio of FEV1:FVC: 86%, Total lung capacity: 2.73 liters (46% of predicted value).

laboratory_examinations.findings: Appreciably impaired platelet function; primary aggregation response was present, but full secondary aggregation was absent.
pH: 7.41, Partial pressure of carbon dioxide: 44 mm Hg (reference range, 35 to 50), Partial pressure of oxygen: 205 mm Hg (reference range, 40 to 90 while breathing ambient air).
